result.title: Programming Contest Series: Round 1
result.content:
Hi all,
The first contest will be held today.
Date: 10/09/2017
Time: 20:30 â€” 23:30 (3 hours)

Make sure you register for the contest here.
Also, to participate, you have to be a member of the group. Request to join if you aren't already one.
Only those who have set institution as IIIT Hyderabad will be added to the group.

Update 1 Contest is over.
Here are the solutions to a few of them. The rest will be updated soon.

A

Problem: http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/459/B
Editorial: http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/13430

B

Problem: http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/454/B
Solution: Find the position of the minimum value (say i), and check if array is increasing in the following order of indices [i, i+1, ... N, 1, 2, ... i-1] ...
